phrases: Takeshi, you have received an invitation from the Schuberstein Competition.
The Maihou Competition's around the same time, but let us cancel that one.
I will not be going to Germany.
I am going to enter the Maihou Music Competition.
It is a golden opportunity that almost never comes up!
And you also need to get overseas exposure before the Chopin competition!
You already won Maihou last year, so there is no reason to make it a priority...
You keep saying that, and how long have we waited?
But he has not shown his face in public for two whole years now.
There are even rumors that he cannot hear anymore.
He might be competing this time.
But my goal is not to go overseas, or to play in the Chopin competition.
The competition that he will be playing in.
It is going to be all right.
All right, that is a great start.
Is she listening to another person's performance?
Could this be the same piano?
He sounds totally different than everyone before him...
A strong will enabling him to stand up to his fears.
An unswerving fortitude at his core.
He is the one who made him grow up.
The reason I was able to hang in there during the two years you were gone...
Have I caught up to you yet?
Or am I even further behind?
Will you let me chase you down like a mirage again?
Will you be the one I aspire to be?
Show me what you have got!
Come on, now it is your turn.
Well, I got to admit he is pretty cool.
A rival is a special thing.
All the more so for adolescent boys.
A rival can make you grow far faster than being taught by someone.
It is all because of you.
It was you who made Takeshi reach those heights, Kousei Arima.
It was all for the sake of catching up to you...
That is what the piano is saying.
Do you feel that way, too?
There will now be a 15-minute intermission.
He was really cool, was not he?
You could even say he is imposing.
He did not make any real mistakes, either.
You can tell how grueling his practice sessions must be.
He does not look it, but he is a diligent player, do not you think?
Even though his mentor, Takayanagi-kun is so shallow!
First place in all of his recent competitions.
He is certainly flying high at the moment.
He is a phenom ready to take the world by storm.
she is fallen quite far back in the pack.
When I used to go cheer Kousei on,
I used to see those three together all the time.
I remember because their names were always at the top.
But of course, it was Kousei who always ended up in first place!
Yeah, and why are you acting so smug again?
So listen, is this Emi-chan any good at the piano?
She is got to be good.
I know how to size up people.
I bet Emi-chan's going to run away with this competition.
I mean,because she is so cute.
Hmm, but I think Igawa-san's been struggling a little lately.
An honorable mention at the Kumagai Competition,
third place at the Tanizaki Music Festival,
and the other day, she did not even make it past the preliminaries.
Sounds like she is been running hot and cold.
To think that those three always used to be a lock for the Top 3...
How is it going with your student, Igawa-san?
I am sure it is all due to your instruction.
In my case, the student has surpassed the master!
But I do believe it is time for him to start thinking globally.
Since there probably is not anything left for him to accomplish domestically.
No one can challenge him anymore in Japan.
You saw that yourself, did not you?
In everyone is eyes, Takeshi is No. 1!
Today, he will destroy Arima, and head overseas!
Emi can be so temperamental, you see.
The most trivial thing can have a drastic effect on her performance.
Like her new shoes pinching her toes,
or her neighbor humming in a bizarre way...
She can even be swayed by the weather that day.
it is been so hectic for everyone, trying to keep her motivated...
Because the goal she should have vanquished had disappeared.
The goal she should have vanquished...
The goal she should have vanquished!
Are you implying that she does not see Takeshi as her goal?
Well, Aiza-kun does not see Emi as a rival either.
It is written all over your face.
Are you trying to pick a fight with me, Ms. Ochiai?
You are the one who threw down the gauntlet, Mr. Takayanagi.
Emi will bring an end to it.
It is been a while since I felt this way.
I went to a piano recital to cheer on a friend.
Just when I was about to fall asleep from boredom,
He was such a bundle of nerves,
that was the first time he would ever performed in front of other people.
That moment of silence before his fingers touched the keys...
The time he took to bid his hesitation and confusion farewell...
The moment his fingers touched the keys,
I am sure it was awkward for young Arima!
He was crestfallen, and beat it out of there.
My heart would not stop pounding, and tears were filling my eyes.
All of my emotions came gushing out at once.
As if I was embodying all the pleasure music brings.
But he, on the other hand...
A slave to the sheet music.
A pianist made only for competitions.
So Kousei Arima's mother, Saki Arima, was dreaming.
She entered her son in that competition to test him,
and her dreams for him began with his magnificent performance.
The dreams that she could never realize for herself.
to give performances that would leave results, that could win competitions.
Exactly what the score calls for.
As an instructor, it is painful not to be able to deny that.
But you are different, are not you?
Because you are a strong child.
You know, she can be unfriendly, and she says stuff that sounds pretty mean,
but she really has a thing for you, you know, Arima.
Yeah, I swear, it is like she is in love with you.
I mean, she was always telling me...
Takeshi, you do not know the real Arima, do you?
She just takes my breath away.
I mean, really... what a sight!
If that is all she is got...
It is true that Emi can be erratic.
the waves of her emotions are surging unsteadily.
It would not be a surprise to see those waves reach their crest.
I am in sync with the piano.
Today, I am in the zone.
Because my new dress looks good on me.
Because I am having a good hair day.
That is got to be it.
No, of course that is not it!
So why am I making excuses to myself?
After two years, he is so near...
He looks a little more mature.
But I knew him at a glance.
Ever since that moment, my excitement has been surging.
He is right there, and he is watching me.
Do you feel that way, too?
I have been playing the piano all this time in order to reject Kousei Arima.
I know that she has the technique.
Let it all out with a bang!
A fourteen-year-old girl has this audience enthralled.
Is she really a junior high student?
I am going to reject you.
even if I get trounced, I am going to reject you every time.
That is not the Kousei Arima that I want to hear.
I am going to reject you with my playing.
What I want to hear is...
Do you feel that way, too?
I am only here because of you.
A performance lasting just under four minutes...
That is what made me a pianist.
the Kousei Arima that I looked up to!
So you play by pouring your soul into the notes, too, huh?
